name: stupendously
content:

in a way that is very surprising, especially by being large in amount, size, or degree: Our charity appeal has been stupendously successful. The crew is stupendously ill-trained.
extremely well: You are working stupendously! The Lion King did stupendously because it was a good movie. See
stupendous
